name: Asparagus With Orange Vinaigrette
keywords: asparagus, mustard, orange, side dish, spring

recipeInstructions.text: Wash asparagus, then trim by breaking at the point where the tough woody part of the stem meets the tender part. Steam over hot water for about 7 minutes, depending on thickness of spears; then, drain.
Whisk the orange rind with oil, mustard and orange juice, and spoon over the asparagus, turning them to coat.
